title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.79 - Articles referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.79 - Articles referenced to this section

State Regulations

When reference is made in section
1211.150
to this section, it means
that said article will be permitted in quantities not to exceed 4000 pounds
gross weight per vehicle when in inside metal containers of not over one quart
capacity each, or in inside glass, earthenware or polyethylene containers of
not over one point or 16 ounces by weight each and packed in strong outside
containers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.79

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
